texts.biography: After the death of Winston Boragus, Tyrrel with his tribe had to leave Krewlod and search for a new home. As luck would have it, he has joined King Kastore's army and now serves as the commander of Ogres.
texts.name: Tyrrel

specialty.name: Stingers
specialty.description:
{Stingers and Bruisers}

Increases Speed of any Stingers or Bruisers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 5 levels (rounded up).
